description: Unique identifier for an issue definition used in work request processes.
User-facing name for this issue category when submitting or tracking work requests.
Optional detailed description or instructions for this issue category.
Identifier of the operating entity or department responsible for this issue; likely links to an operations/organization table; confirm with SME.
Target completion timeframe in calendar days for requests of this issue category.
Users to notify when this issueâ€™s requests are created or updated; likely stored as a reference list or delimited IDs; confirm with SME.
Rule defining how potential duplicate requests for this issue are handled (e.g., allow, warn, block, merge); confirm with SME.
User-defined field for custom metadata related to this issue; exact meaning varies by deployment; confirm with SME.
User ID of whoever created this issue definition.
Date and time the issue definition was created.
User ID of whoever last updated this issue definition.
Date and time of the most recent update to this issue definition.
Default priority code for work requests of this issue (e.g., Low/Normal/High); values are coded; confirm with SME.
Sequence number used to order this issue among others in lists or processing.
Indicator whether new requests with this issue are auto-assigned to a default owner/team (Y/N).
